text: @CSIS #Ukraine #War #Russia #US #WesternAidTwo years have passed since Russia's invasion of Ukraine. The war rages on, with both sides dug in and determined. Join us for a virtual discussion with experts from the CSIS International Security Program as we assess the state of the conflict, Ukrainian and Russian strategies, and the future of Western aid to Ukraine. Don't miss this opportunity to gain valuable insights into one of the most pressing issues of our time.
